title: Apparently the Gal who Bullies me Likes me - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shounen
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Bullying   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple POV
author: ぺいぺい
description:
I’m being bullied by a group of 5 gals in my class.

I go to Eisho Highschool, a school were it is easy to pass the entrance exam. It’s also the school were a lot of delinquents gather I had no choice but to go to this school because I didn’t study and got a bad grade.

When the school year started the group of 5 gals started bullying me in different ways. But after a while Kyoko Tachibana one of the gals who were bullying me was being nice to me and is always helping me. I wonder what’s up with her.>
